items.summary: Implement the provided per-industry color schemes on all industry-specific pages so that each page uses its industry background color for the top hero/banner section and uses the industry primary color for key highlights (e.g., page title accent, section headings, links, icon accents) while maintaining a clean, modern corporate B2B look.

Add a centralized, explicit mapping from industry page IDs to their theme tokens (primary_color, optional accent_color, background_color) and ensure the mapping keys align with existing industry page IDs used by routing and content (e.g., corporate-enterprise, education, healthcare, manufacturing, government, hospitality, banking, training-centers, retail, live-events).

Handle the missing/unuploaded logo gracefully across the header and footer by adding a robust fallback when the configured logo image cannot be loaded (e.g., swap to a text-based brand mark using BRAND.name or a locally-generated placeholder logo asset) without breaking layout in desktop or mobile navigation.
Add (or regenerate) a clean corporate wordmark placeholder logo image matching the existing configured logo path so the site has a consistent logo until the real logo is uploaded.
